subject: Order #SSN1793
description_text:
I have had my pedals just over 6 months and my clutch has just stopped working I have tried everything everyone has recommended and nothing is working and I’m emailing to see if you can help with anything

Many thanks
Jacob willis

conversations.body_text: Hi Jacob Willis,  Don’t worry. Please record a video explaining the issue and send it to us via Google Drive with the proper access permissions. We will assist you in resolving the problem.
